pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, December 9, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening remarks of the Summit for Democracy, which will be delivered by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Note for media:

  • The opening remarks will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.state.gov/summit-for-democracy

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Summit for Democracy’s Leaders’ Plenary Session, where he will deliver remarks.

Closed to media

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually deliver remarks during the Special Chiefs Assembly of the Assembly of First Nations. Following his remarks, the Prime Minister will participate in a question and answer session with Chiefs from the Assembly of First Nations.

Notes for media:

  • Media can register to watch the virtual session via the following link: https://meetings.afn.ca/Meeting
  • Registration for accredited media is free.
